mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.advet_url AS "advetUrl", a.advet_jump_url AS "advetJumpUrl"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ctc_advet( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, advet_url, advet_jump_url ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{advetUrl}, #{advetJumpUrl} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ctc_advet SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, advet_url = #{advetUrl}, advet_jump_url = #{advetJumpUrl} WHERE id = #{id}
